name: fetch_client_menu
description: Shows a menu to select and fetch a window to your active workspace.

commands.name: fetch_client_menu
commands.short_description: Select a client window and move it to the active workspace.
commands.full_description: Select a client window and move it to the active workspace.

commands.name: unfetch_client
commands.short_description: Return a window back to its origin.
commands.full_description: Return a window back to its origin.

config.name: parameters
config.description: Extra parameters for the menu engine command

config.name: separator
config.description: Separator between window number and title

config.name: center_on_fetch
config.description: Center the fetched window on the focused monitor

config.name: margin
config.description: Margin from monitor edges in pixels when centering/resizing
